Package RelationBinaire

Class MathsRelation<T>

java.lang.Object
RelationBinaire.MathsRelation<T>
Type Parameters:
T - generic type
All Implemented Interfaces:
Relation<T>
public class MathsRelation<T> extends Object implements Relation<T>
Class offering basic operations on binary relations in maths

  • Method Details

    • estReflexive

      public boolean estReflexive()
      Description copied from interface: Relation
      This method checks if the binary relation is reflexive. A relation R is reflexive if for all (a, b) in R, (a, a) and (b, b) is also in R.
      Specified by:
      estReflexive in interface Relation<T>
      Returns:
      true if reflexive, false otherwise

    • estSymetrique

      public boolean estSymetrique()
      Description copied from interface: Relation
      This method checks if the binary relation is symmetric. A relation R is symmetric if for all (a, b) in R, (b, a) is also in R.
      Specified by:
      estSymetrique in interface Relation<T>
      Returns:
      true if symmetric, false otherwise

    • estAntisymetrique

      public boolean estAntisymetrique()
      Description copied from interface: Relation
      This method checks if the binary relation is antisymmetric. A relation R is antisymmetric if for all (a, b) and (b, a) in R, a == b.
      Specified by:
      estAntisymetrique in interface Relation<T>
      Returns:
      true if antisymmetric, false otherwise

    • estTransitive

      public boolean estTransitive()
      Description copied from interface: Relation
      This method checks if the binary relation is transitive. A relation R is transitive if for all (a, b) and (b, c) in R, (a, c) is also in R.
      Specified by:
      estTransitive in interface Relation<T>
      Returns:
      true if transitive, false otherwise
